mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.order_amount AS "orderAmount", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.order_status AS "orderStatus", a.trade_id AS "tradeId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.trans_id as "transId", a.trans_date as "transDate", a.house_id as "houseId"
mapper.select: SELECT * from t_payment_order where order_status = '1' and house_id=#{houseId} order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_payment_order( id, order_id, order_amount, order_date, order_status, trade_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, trans_id, trans_date, house_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{orderAmount}, #{orderDate}, #{orderStatus}, #{tradeId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{transId}, #{transDate}, #{houseId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_payment_order SET order_id = #{orderId}, order_amount = #{orderAmount}, order_date = #{orderDate}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, trade_id = #{tradeId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, trans_id = #{transId}, trans_date = #{transDate} WHERE id = #{id}
